languages.text: "Мы обнаружили мир с давно опустевшей колонией, основанной века назад одним из ваших предшественников. Туда был отправлен корабль с несколькими тысячами колонистов, что должны были восстановить заброшенное поселение. После того, как корабль прибыл в систему назначения, связь с ним была потеряна, судьба судна неизвестна. Возможно, вы захотите лично разобраться в том, что с ним произошло".

traits.locale_text: "Да, Лорд-капитан. Мы обнаружили мир с давно опустившей колонией, основанной века назад одним из ваших предшественников. Туда был отправлен корабль с несколькими тысячами колонистов, что должны были восстановить заброшенное поселение. После того, как корабль прибыл в систему назначения, связь с ним была потеряна, судьба судна неизвестна. Возможно, вы захотите лично разобраться в том, что с ним произошло".

languages.text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."
languages.original_text: "Мы обнаружили мир с давно опустевшей колонией, основанной века назад одним из ваших предшественников. Туда был отправлен корабль с несколькими тысячами колонистов, что должны были восстановить заброшенное поселение. После того, как корабль прибыл в систему назначения, связь с ним была потеряна, судьба судна неизвестна. Возможно, вы захотите лично разобраться в том, что с ним произошло".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, Lord Captain. We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

languages.text: “我们发现了某个世界，几百年前，您的其中一位前任行商浪人下令在那里建立殖民地，但后来却遭到了废弃。我们派了一艘殖民飞船过去，里面载着几千名殖民者。他们本该恢复那座遭到遗弃的殖民地，可当飞船进入星系之后，便与我们失去了联系。我们目前并不知道那艘飞船的下落，或许您打算亲自调查一下那艘失踪的飞船。”
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: “确实有，舰长大人。我们发现了某个世界，几百年前，您的其中一位前任行商浪人下令在那里建立殖民地，但后来却遭到了废弃。我们派了一艘殖民飞船过去，里面载着几千名殖民者。他们本该恢复那座遭到遗弃的殖民地，可当飞船进入星系之后，便与我们失去了联系。我们目前并不知道那艘飞船的下落，或许您打算亲自调查一下那艘失踪的飞船。”

languages.text: "Wir haben eine Welt entdeckt, die Heimat einer längst verlassenen Kolonie ist, welche vor Jahrhunderten von einem Eurer Vorgänger gegründet worden war. Es wurde ein Schiff mit mehreren tausend Kolonisten auf diese Welt geschickt, um die verlassene Siedlung wiederherzustellen. Nachdem das Schiff in seinem Zielsystem angekommen war, ist der Kontakt abgebrochen. Wir wissen nicht, was aus ihm geworden ist. Vielleicht solltet Ihr das Verschwinden dieses Schiffs persönlich untersuchen."
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Lord Captain. Wir haben eine Welt entdeckt, die Heimat einer längst verlassenen Kolonie ist, welche vor Jahrhunderten von einem Eurer Vorgänger gegründet worden war. Es wurde ein Schiff mit mehreren tausend Kolonisten auf diese Welt geschickt, um die verlassene Siedlung wiederherzustellen. Nachdem das Schiff in seinem Zielsystem angekommen war, ist der Kontakt abgebrochen. Wir wissen nicht, was aus ihm geworden ist. Vielleicht solltet Ihr das Verschwinden dieses Schiffs persönlich untersuchen."

languages.text: «Descubrimos un planeta que alberga una colonia abandonada, fundada hace siglos por uno de sus predecesores. Se envió allí una nave con varios millares de colonos para que reconstruyesen el asentamiento. Cuando la nave entró en el sistema de destino, se perdió el contacto con ella; nadie sabe qué fue de ella. Quizá le interese investigar su desaparición personalmente».
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, Lord Capitán. Descubrimos un planeta que alberga una colonia abandonada, fundada hace siglos por uno de sus predecesores. Se envió allí una nave con varios millares de colonos para que reconstruyesen el asentamiento. Cuando la nave entró en el sistema de destino, se perdió el contacto con ella; nadie sabe qué fue de ella. Quizá le interese investigar su desaparición personalmente».

languages.text: « Nous avons découvert un monde qui héberge une colonie abandonnée depuis longtemps, fondée il y a des siècles par l'un de vos prédécesseurs. Un vaisseau y a été envoyé avec à son bord plusieurs milliers de colons chargés de reprendre possession des lieux, mais quand l'appareil a pénétré dans le système, les communications ont cessé et nous ignorons ce qu'il est devenu. Peut-être souhaitez-vous enquêter sur sa disparition vous-même ? »
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous avons découvert un monde qui héberge une colonie abandonnée depuis longtemps, fondée il y a des siècles par l'un de vos prédécesseurs. Un vaisseau y a été envoyé avec à son bord plusieurs milliers de colons chargés de reprendre possession des lieux, mais quand l'appareil a pénétré dans le système, les communications ont cessé et nous ignorons ce qu'il est devenu. Peut-être souhaitez-vous enquêter sur sa disparition vous-même ? »

languages.text: 「私たちは、何世紀も前にあなたの前任者が築き、長い間放置されていたコロニーがある惑星を発見しました。数千人の入植者を乗せた船が派遣され、荒れ果てた入植地を復興させる予定でした。船は目的地の星系に入った後、連絡が途絶え、その後どうなったのかは不明のままです。おそらくあなたは、その船の消息を地震で調査したいのではないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: 「はい、ロード・キャプテン。私たちは、何世紀も前にあなたの前任者が築き、長い間放置されていたコロニーがある惑星を発見しました。数千人の入植者を乗せた船が派遣され、荒れ果てた入植地を復興させる予定でした。船は目的地の星系に入った後、連絡が途絶え、その後どうなったのかは不明のままです。おそらくあなたは、その船の消息を地震で調査したいのではないでしょうか」

languages.text: "Seleflerinizin biri tarafından asırlar önce kurulmuş ve uzun zaman önce terk edilmiş bir koloniye ev sahipliği yapan bir dünya keşfettik. Harabe yerleşim yerini düzeltmeleri için birkaç bin kolonisti taşıyan bir gemi buraya gönderildi. Gemi, hedef sisteme giriş yaptığında iletişim koptu ve hâlâ ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Belki bu geminin kayboluşunu şahsen araştırmak istersiniz."
languages.original_text: "We discovered a world that is home to a long-abandoned colony founded centuries ago by one of your predecessors. A ship was sent there, carrying several thousand colonists who were to restore the derelict settlement. After the ship entered its system of destination, contact was lost with it, and its fate remains unknown. Perhaps you might like to investigate the disappearance of that vessel personally."

traits.locale_text: "Seleflerinizin biri tarafından asırlar önce kurulmuş ve uzun zaman önce terk edilmiş bir koloniye ev sahipliği yapan bir dünya keşfettik. Harabe yerleşim yerini düzeltmeleri için birkaç bin kolonisti taşıyan bir gemi buraya gönderildi. Gemi, hedef sisteme giriş yaptığında iletişim koptu ve hâlâ ne olduğu bilinmiyor. Belki bu geminin kayboluşunu şahsen araştırmak istersiniz."
